text:
@SenSchumer pls dont spread fake news.
TESTING PROBLEM IS FIXED.
if ur dr requires c-virus testing, u would n should get one.
any evidence to the contrary?
facts:
c-virus: 498,674 cases; 18,509 deaths; 2,526,853 total tests.
pls compare total tests w/other countries.
https://t.co/toYaSaGYMF
